==================== START: .bmad-regbio-lab-expansion-pack/templates/sample-receipt-and-fixation-tmpl.yaml ====================
sample_receipt_and_fixation:
  project: "{{project}}"
  samples:
    - id: "{{sample_id}}"
      tissue: "{{tissue}}"
      fixative: "10% NBF|PFA|Others"
      ratio_tissue_to_fixative: "1:10"
      time_to_fix: "{{minutes}}"
      fixation_time: "{{hours}}"
      temperature: "{{temp}}"
      anomalies: "{{notes}}"
  coi_coc: true
==================== END: .bmad-regbio-lab-expansion-pack/templates/sample-receipt-and-fixation-tmpl.yaml ====================

==================== START: .bmad-regbio-lab-expansion-pack/templates/processing-embed-section-tmpl.yaml ====================
processing_embed_section:
  dehydration: ["70%", "80%", "95%", "100%"]
  clearing: ["xylene|substitute"]
  paraffin: "{{temp}}"
  embedding_orientation: "{{orientation}}"
  section_thickness_um: "{{thickness}}"
  storage: "{{conditions}}"
==================== END: .bmad-regbio-lab-expansion-pack/templates/processing-embed-section-tmpl.yaml ====================

==================== START: .bmad-regbio-lab-expansion-pack/templates/ihc-optimization-plan-tmpl.yaml ====================
ihc_optimization:
  antigen_retrieval: "{{buffer}} {{pH}} {{time}}"
  primary_antibody: "{{clone}} @ {{dilution}}"
  detection_system: "{{HRP/DAB|AP/FastRed}}"
  controls: ["positive tissue", "isotype", "competition"]
  acceptance: "{{criteria}}"
==================== END: .bmad-regbio-lab-expansion-pack/templates/ihc-optimization-plan-tmpl.yaml ====================

==================== START: .bmad-regbio-lab-expansion-pack/templates/if-panel-plan-tmpl.yaml ====================
if_panel:
  targets: ["{{marker1}}", "{{marker2}}", "{{marker3}}"]
  fluors: ["{{fluor1}}", "{{fluor2}}", "{{fluor3}}"]
  order: ["sequential|simultaneous"]
  exposure_ms: ["{{exp1}}", "{{exp2}}"]
  bleedthrough_controls: true
==================== END: .bmad-regbio-lab-expansion-pack/templates/if-panel-plan-tmpl.yaml ====================

==================== START: .bmad-regbio-lab-expansion-pack/templates/ish-probe-design-tmpl.yaml ====================
ish_probe:
  target_gene: "{{gene}}"
  probe_type: "chromogenic|fluorescent"
  hybridization: "{{temp}} {{time}}"
  washing: "{{stringency}}"
  controls: ["sense/antisense", "housekeeping"]
==================== END: .bmad-regbio-lab-expansion-pack/templates/ish-probe-design-tmpl.yaml ====================

==================== START: .bmad-regbio-lab-expansion-pack/templates/imaging-settings-tmpl.yaml ====================
imaging_settings:
  modality: "widefield|confocal|two-photon|light-sheet"
  channels:
    - name: "{{ch}}"
      ex_em: "{{ex}}/{{em}}"
      laser_power: "{{mW}}"
      exposure_ms: "{{exp}}"
      pinhole_AU: "{{pinhole}}"
  sampling: { pixel_size_nm: "{{px}}", z_step_um: "{{z}}", averaging: "{{avg}}" }
  live_cell: { temp: "{{temp}}", CO2: "{{co2}}", humidity: "{{humidity}}" }
==================== END: .bmad-regbio-lab-expansion-pack/templates/imaging-settings-tmpl.yaml ====================

  steps: ["illumination_correction", "segmentation", "feature_extraction", "stats"]
  version: "{{version}}"
  thresholds: { min_area: "{{px}}", min_signal: "{{au}}" }

==================== START: .bmad-regbio-lab-expansion-pack/templates/quarantine-plan-tmpl.yaml ====================
quarantine_plan:
  scope: "Incoming materials and equipment"
  conditions:
    status_label: "QUARANTINE"
    storage_location: "Quarantine cage/room/shelf"
  release_criteria:
    - "COA verified"
    - "Visual inspection pass"
    - "Temperature logger in range"
  nonconformance_actions:
    - "Segregate and label NONCONFORMING"
    - "Notify QA and supplier"
    - "Create deviation record"
  records:
    form: "Quarantine Log"
    retained_years: 10
  responsibilities:
    owner: "Warehouse/EHS/QA"
  approvals:
    released_by_role: "QA"
==================== END: .bmad-regbio-lab-expansion-pack/templates/quarantine-plan-tmpl.yaml ====================

  method: "soiled bedding|contact"
  frequency: "quarterly"
  room_coverage: "{{rooms}}"
  agents: ["MNV", "MPV", "MHV", "Sendai", "Pinworm"]
  reporting: "summary + actions"
==================== END: .bmad-regbio-lab-expansion-pack/templates/sentinel-plan-tmpl.yaml ====================

  rooms:
    - id: "{{room}}"
      level: "SPF|SPF/BSL2"
      pressure_setpoint_Pa: "{{delta}}"
      ach: "{{air_changes}}"
      flow: "single-pass|recirc with HEPA"
  flows: ["personnel", "materials", "waste"]

colony_breeding_plan:
  species: "Mouse|Rat"
  strains: ["C57BL/6J"]
  founder_pairs: 5
  mating_scheme: "monogamous|harem"
  genotyping:
    method: "PCR"
    schedule_days_postnatal: [14, 21]
    markers: ["GeneX"]
  health_monitoring:
    sentinel_frequency_weeks: 12
    pathogens_panel: ["MHV", "Sendai"]
  weaning_age_days: 21
  census:
    frequency_weeks: 1
    records_required: ["DOB", "Sex", "Genotype", "Cage ID"]
  capacity_limits:
    max_cage_per_room: 200
  disposition:
    surplus_policy: "adoption|transfer|euthanasia"
  approvals:
    iacuc_protocol: "{{protocol_id}}"
    valid_until: "{{date}}"

# æ¨¡å¼è¿ç§»è®¡åˆ’ â€” {{version}}

èŒƒå›´/å½±å“è¯„ä¼° â†’ è¿ç§»è„šæœ¬ â†’ æ•°æ®å¤‡ä»½ä¸å›æ»š â†’ éªŒè¯ä¸ç­¾ç½² â†’ å˜æ›´è®°å½•ã€‚

==================== START: .bmad-regbio-lab-expansion-pack/templates/rbac-policy-tmpl.yaml ====================
rbac:
  roles:
    - name: "Operator"
      rights: ["read", "create_own"]
    - name: "Reviewer"
      rights: ["read", "review", "sign"]
    - name: "Admin"
      rights: ["all"]
  separation_of_duties:
    - ["Operator", "Reviewer"]
  least_privilege: true
==================== END: .bmad-regbio-lab-expansion-pack/templates/rbac-policy-tmpl.yaml ====================

==================== START: .bmad-regbio-lab-expansion-pack/templates/esign-policy-tmpl.yaml ====================
esign:
  multi_factor: true
  signature_components: ["user_id", "meaning", "time", "reason"]
  certificate: "internal|external CA"
  non_repudiation: true
  retention_years: 15
==================== END: .bmad-regbio-lab-expansion-pack/templates/esign-policy-tmpl.yaml ====================

==================== START: .bmad-regbio-lab-expansion-pack/templates/instrument-interface-spec-tmpl.yaml ====================
instrument_interface:
  instrument: "{{name}}"
  method: "API|File|SCPI|OPC-UA|Serial"
  mapping: { source_field: "dest_field", unit: "{{unit}}", transform: "{{fn}}" }
  errors: ["retry", "quarantine", "alert"]
  reconciliation: true
==================== END: .bmad-regbio-lab-expansion-pack/templates/instrument-interface-spec-tmpl.yaml ====================

==================== START: .bmad-regbio-lab-expansion-pack/templates/middleware-contract-tmpl.yaml ====================
middleware:
  transport: "AMQP|Kafka|REST"
  topics: ["lims.events", "instrument.results"]
  schema_registry: true
  retries_backoff: "exponential"
  dlq: true
==================== END: .bmad-regbio-lab-expansion-pack/templates/middleware-contract-tmpl.yaml ====================

==================== START: .bmad-regbio-lab-expansion-pack/templates/barcode-and-label-spec-tmpl.yaml ====================
barcode_label:
  schemes:
    - entity: "Sample"
      prefix: "S"
      format: "S-YYYY-####"
      symbology: "DataMatrix"
    - entity: "Batch"
      prefix: "B"
      format: "B-YYYYMM-#####"
      symbology: "Code128"
  label_layout: { width_mm: 25, height_mm: 10, fields: ["id", "name", "expiry"] }
  print_quality: ">=300dpi"
==================== END: .bmad-regbio-lab-expansion-pack/templates/barcode-and-label-spec-tmpl.yaml ====================

==================== START: .bmad-regbio-lab-expansion-pack/templates/calibration-plan-tmpl.yaml ====================
calibration_plan:
  instruments:
    - sensor: "{{sensor}}"
      location: "{{location}}"
      range: "{{range}}"
      accuracy: "{{accuracy}}"
  intervals_months: 12
  standards_traceability: "NMI/NIST"
  acceptance_criteria: "{{criteria}}"
  as_found_as_left: true
  environmental_conditions:
    temperature_c: "20-24"
    humidity_percent: "40-60"
  records: true
  approvals:
    prepared_by: "name/signature/date"
    reviewed_by: "name/signature/date"
    approved_by: "name/signature/date"
==================== END: .bmad-regbio-lab-expansion-pack/templates/calibration-plan-tmpl.yaml ====================

  frequencies: ["daily", "weekly", "monthly"]
  thresholds: "see thresholds table"
  actions_on_alarm: ["quarantine", "root cause", "retest"]

  split: { train: 0.7, val: 0.15, test: 0.15, external: true }
  metrics: ["AUROC", "AUPRC", "F1", "Calibration"]
  explainability: ["saliency", "SHAP"]
  bias_checks: ["site", "stain", "scanner"]
  drift_monitoring: ["PSI", "feature drift"]

==================== START: .bmad-regbio-lab-expansion-pack/templates/barcode-and-label-spec-tmpl.yaml ====================
barcode_label:
  schemes:
    - entity: "Sample"
      prefix: "S"
      format: "S-YYYY-####"
      symbology: "DataMatrix"
    - entity: "Batch"
      prefix: "B"
      format: "B-YYYYMM-#####"
      symbology: "Code128"
  label_layout: { width_mm: 25, height_mm: 10, fields: ["id", "name", "expiry"] }
  print_quality: ">=300dpi"
==================== END: .bmad-regbio-lab-expansion-pack/templates/barcode-and-label-spec-tmpl.yaml ====================

==================== START: .bmad-regbio-lab-expansion-pack/templates/lims-domain-model-tmpl.yaml ====================
lims_domain_model:
  entities:
    Sample:
      fields:
        sample_id: "string"
        type: "string"
        collection_time: "datetime"
        subject_id: "string"
        status: "enum(received, processing, stored, disposed)"
      relations:
        - name: "belongs_to"
          target: "Batch"
    Batch:
      fields:
        batch_id: "string"
        project_id: "string"
        received_date: "date"
      relations:
        - name: "has_many"
          target: "Sample"
    Test:
      fields:
        test_id: "string"
        method: "string"
        instrument_id: "string"
        status: "enum(pending, running, complete, failed)"
      relations:
        - name: "performed_on"
          target: "Sample"
    Result:
      fields:
        result_id: "string"
        test_id: "string"
        analyte: "string"
        value: "number"
        unit: "string"
        flags: "string"
  constraints:
    - "sample.sample_id unique"
    - "result.test_id references test.test_id"
==================== END: .bmad-regbio-lab-expansion-pack/templates/lims-domain-model-tmpl.yaml ====================

==================== START: .bmad-regbio-lab-expansion-pack/templates/lims-eln-spec-tmpl.yaml ====================
lims_eln_spec:
  authentication:
    type: "SAML2|OIDC"
  e_signature:
    part11_compliant: true
    signing_reason_required: true
  rbac:
    roles: ["Operator", "Reviewer", "Approver", "Admin"]
  records:
    audit_trail: true
    retention_years: 15
  integrations:
    instruments:
      - name: "{{instrument}}"
        protocol: "OPC-UA|Serial|CSV"
        direction: "unidirectional|bidirectional"
    storage:
      - type: "S3|NFS"
        encryption: "AES-256"
  barcoding:
    symbologies: ["Code128", "DataMatrix"]
  label_templates:
    default:
      size: "25x50mm"
      fields: ["sample_id", "batch_id", "expiry"]
==================== END: .bmad-regbio-lab-expansion-pack/templates/lims-eln-spec-tmpl.yaml ====================

  scope: "Incoming materials and equipment"
  conditions:
    status_label: "QUARANTINE"
    storage_location: "Quarantine cage/room/shelf"
  release_criteria:
    - "COA verified"
    - "Visual inspection pass"
    - "Temperature logger in range"
  nonconformance_actions:
    - "Segregate and label NONCONFORMING"
    - "Notify QA and supplier"
    - "Create deviation record"
  records:
    form: "Quarantine Log"
    retained_years: 10
  responsibilities:
    owner: "Warehouse/EHS/QA"
  approvals:
    released_by_role: "QA"

    - ["Operator", "Reviewer"]
  least_privilege: true

==================== START: .bmad-regbio-lab-expansion-pack/templates/release-spec-tmpl.yaml ====================
release_spec:
  identity: ["Markers panel meets threshold", "scRNA-seq similarity score >= {{score}}"]
  purity: [">={{min_purity}}% lineage-specific cells"]
  viability: [">={{min_viability}}%"]
  mycoplasma: ["Negative"]
  sterility: ["No growth"]
  endotoxin: ["<={{eu_limit}} EU/mL"]
  functional: ["{{assay}} >= {{threshold}}"]
  barrier_function: ["TEER >= {{teer}} Î©Â·cmÂ² ?"]
  electrophysiology: ["Network index >= {{net_idx}} ?"]

## Purpose
